LanguageData.ApplyOnPlayerNotColonists: Apply on player pawns but not colonists (animals, robots, etc.)
LanguageData.ApplyOnNotEnemyFactionPawns: Apply on not enemy faction pawns
LanguageData.DisableNote: Note: In the current version, to virtually disable these values, please enter the maximum value (= 99999) for each.
